overview: Laurel Mack after imploding in the worst way possible on a wildly popular American dating show, must do the ultimate walk of shameâ€¦back to her hometown. Having failed to win love on the show, she finds herself living in her quirky parents basement, without any friends, constantly bumping into the miserable ex the whole town adores, while experiencing the constant mockery of all who witnessed her public meltdown. She embarks on a hilarious and heartfelt journey to discover self-love and, with that, real connections with others.
title: Hot Mess
